entry.title: Sunday night: A few flurries. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending before morning then mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 19 February 2023
